column1: Wanted TGT Tamil Teacher For A Leading CBSE School - OMAN
column2: Should have BA, MA and B.Ed. in Tamil from regular mode. Should have minimum 3 years experience as a Tamil teacher from CBSE school. Should able to handle classes up to 10th grade Male also can apply.
